trans-unit.source: Learn how you can use the Azure Data Factory service to transform and analyze data.
trans-unit.target: Learn how you can use the Azure Data Factory service to transform and analyze data.

trans-unit.source: Transform and analyze using Azure Data Factory
trans-unit.target: Transform and analyze using Azure Data Factory

trans-unit.source: Transformation activities in Azure Data Factory transform and process your raw data into predictions and insights.
trans-unit.target: Transformation activities in Azure Data Factory transform and process your raw data into predictions and insights.

trans-unit.source: The transformation activity executes in a computing environment such as Azure HDInsight cluster or an Azure Batch.
trans-unit.target: The transformation activity executes in a computing environment such as Azure HDInsight cluster or an Azure Batch.

trans-unit.source: Azure Data Factory supports the following transformation activities that can be added to [pipelines](data-factory-create-pipelines.md) either individually or chained with another activity.
trans-unit.target: Azure Data Factory supports the following transformation activities that can be added to [pipelines](data-factory-create-pipelines.md) either individually or chained with another activity.

trans-unit.source: You need to create a linked service for the compute environment and then use the linked service when defining a transformation activity.
trans-unit.target: You need to create a linked service for the compute environment and then use the linked service when defining a transformation activity.

trans-unit.source: There are two types of compute environments supported by Data Factory.
trans-unit.target: There are two types of compute environments supported by Data Factory.

trans-unit.source: **On-Demand**: In this case, the computing environment is fully managed by Data Factory.
trans-unit.target: **On-Demand**: In this case, the computing environment is fully managed by Data Factory.

trans-unit.source: It is automatically created by the Data Factory service before a job is submitted to process data and removed when the job is completed.
trans-unit.target: It is automatically created by the Data Factory service before a job is submitted to process data and removed when the job is completed.

trans-unit.source: Users can configure and control granular settings of the on-demand compute environment for job execution, cluster management, and bootstrapping actions.
trans-unit.target: Users can configure and control granular settings of the on-demand compute environment for job execution, cluster management, and bootstrapping actions.

trans-unit.source: **Bring Your Own**: In this case, you can register your own computing environment (for example HDInsight cluster) as a linked service in Data Factory.
trans-unit.target: **Bring Your Own**: In this case, you can register your own computing environment (for example HDInsight cluster) as a linked service in Data Factory.

trans-unit.source: The computing environment is managed by you and the Data Factory service uses it to execute the activities.
trans-unit.target: The computing environment is managed by you and the Data Factory service uses it to execute the activities.

trans-unit.source: See [Compute Linked Services](data-factory-compute-linked-services.md) article to learn about compute linked services supported by Data Factory.
trans-unit.target: See [Compute Linked Services](data-factory-compute-linked-services.md) article to learn about compute linked services supported by Data Factory.

trans-unit.source: We would really appreciate your feedback on this article.
trans-unit.target: We would really appreciate your feedback on this article.

trans-unit.source: Please take a few minutes to submit your feedback via [email](mailto:adfdocfeedback@microsoft.com?subject=data-factory-data-transformation-activities.md).
trans-unit.target: Please take a few minutes to submit your feedback via [email](mailto:adfdocfeedback@microsoft.com?subject=data-factory-data-transformation-activities.md).
